articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Malawian President
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Malawian President 
    Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from Bakili Muluzi, president of Malawi and chairman of the United Democratic Front of Malawi.
 The gift was handed to Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, by Rodwell Thomas C. Munyenyembe, member of the Central Executive Committee of the front and defence minister of Malawi, on a visit to the DPRK on October 12.

articles.title: Work of Kim Jong Il Published in Czech Republic
articles.content:
Work of Kim Jong Il Published in Czech Republic 
    Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Juche Philosophy Is an Original Revolutionary Philosophy" was published in pamphlet by the Czech Futra Publishing House.
 The work, made public on July 26, Juche 85 (1996), gives an all-round exposition of the uniqueness and superiority of the Juche philosophy to the preceding philosophy of the working class. Noted in the work is that the Juche philosophy constitutes the revolutionary philosophy, political philosophy of the Workers' Party of Korea. Also given in the work are the principled matters that should be held fast to in study, explanation and propaganda of the Juche philosophy.    
 The publishing house said that it publishes the work with boundless reverence for Kim Jong Il, an outstanding thinker and theoretician, in commemoration of the 58th anniversary of the WPK.

Hydraulic Coal-Cutting Proves Effective in DPRK
articles.content:
Hydraulic Coal-Cutting Proves Effective in DPRK
    Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The hydraulic coal-cutting method has widely been introduced in coal mines in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. 
 The Kangdong Coal Mine of the Kangdong Area Coal Complex mines and transports coal with water pressure of 1 mega pascal, without using mining equipment, tools and blasting materials including rock-drill, coal truck, loader and explosive. Every month, therefore, the coal mine saves 40 percent of labor power and 60 percent of mine props while increasing the operation capacity of coal pits 1.6-2 times and the coal production 2.4 times per head.    
 Many other coal mines are making preparations to introduce this method into coal production.

articles.content:
S. Korean Delegation Here
    Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- A south Korean delegation with Minister of Unification Jong Se Hyon as its chief delegate arrived here on Oct. 14 to participate in the 12th inter-Korean ministerial talks.
 It was greeted at the airport by delegates of the north side to the talks.    
 Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Pak Pong Ju hosted a reception in honor of the south Korean delegation at the Mansudae Art Theatre this evening.
